localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Datature is the fastest way to build your own computer vision models. Manage datasets, annotate, train, and deploy - we get ALL teams and companies on the right pipeline from day one!
nodes.title: Datature - No-code platform for building deep neural nets
nodes.author: Keechin

nodes.excerpt: For Sellers: Automate the process of finding & collecting authentic product review videos from YouTube & new customers leading to more time on site and higher conversions. â € For Shoppers: See instant social proof & experience a better product presentation.
nodes.title: Reeview for Shopify Sellers - Authentic product video reviews for your Shopify store
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.title:
Apple will reportedly use Tesla battery packs to store energy from a solar farm in Northern California.
https://t.co/3LN0PcO64G
nodes.author: MarketWatch

nodes.excerpt: Breathly is a 100% free mobile app that helps you focus on your breathing. Use Breathly for daily relaxation and breath training: just choose a breathing technique and focus on the guided exercise. Breathly is free, with no trackers and no in-app purchases.
nodes.title: Breathly - Open-source breath training and relaxation app
nodes.author: Matteo Mazzarolo

nodes.excerpt: webping.cloud is the easiest way to find the latency between you and all popular cloud data centers. All in a single page with simultaneous checks.
nodes.title: WebPing - Single page for multi-cloud latency test
nodes.author: Guilherme Oenning

nodes.title: OnlyFans is on track for almost $1bn in revenue this year after spending climbed 400% during the pandemic
nodes.author: The_Real_Fly

nodes.excerpt: Ever thought your browser theme was boring, bland, and just getting old? Add some color your daily browsing experience with a new custom theme for Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge! You can customize and control every single feature of your theme. Make it yours!
nodes.title: Chrome Theme Studio - Easily create a theme for most Chromium-based browsers
nodes.author: Jamsheed Mistri

nodes.excerpt: Do you work 10+ hours without taking breaks? You're not alone. Work breaks are simple and powerful yet we skip them because they're boring â € Cuely uses behavior design, positive psychology and social support to make it fun so you can stay well and feel happier
nodes.title: Cuely - 1-min guided exercises to stay well all day with reminders
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Lip Gloss a Go library for designing terminal user interfaces. It takes an expressive, declarative approach to terminal rendering. Users familiar with CSS will feel right at home with Lip Gloss.
nodes.title: Lip Gloss - Design terminal user interfaces
nodes.author: Christian Rocha

nodes.excerpt: RewardMe is a new way of reward program that helps you earn rewards automatically at your favourite merchants. By simply binding your email accounts or credit cards, you will automatically get rewarded on eligible purchases in cryptocurrency or reward dollars.
nodes.title: RewardMe - Up to 10% cashback in crypto for food, ride and e-commerce
nodes.author: Heatherm Huang

nodes.excerpt: Backprop is an API/platform that makes enhancing software with machine learning simple. With powerful out-of-the-box models, easy custom uploads, scalable infrastructure, and an affordable pricing scheme, Backprop has everything you need.
nodes.title: Backprop - Serverless machine learning API for every developer
nodes.author: Owen LaCava

nodes.title: RT @Fxhedgers: ARCHEGOS CAPITAL LOST $110 BILLION IN 5 DAYS USING 500% LEVERAGE -FT
nodes.author: The_Real_Fly

sharedContent.title: ARCHEGOS CAPITAL LOST $110 BILLION IN 5 DAYS USING 500% LEVERAGE -FT

nodes.excerpt: Today we are excited to announce a new project from Zeitgeist (zeitgeist.fm): 30K under 30! It's a self-nominated list of the 30,000 most influential people on the internet, as described by an AI. Nominate yourself for the list: 30Kunder30.com
nodes.title: 30K under 30 - The 30,000 most influential people online, as told by an AI
nodes.author: Noah Putnam

nodes.excerpt: JustStream can stream media and screencast to a TV, all the while maintaining a compact form with low CPU use. Broadcast your media in any format, any resolution (including Ultra HD), and most importantly, without the need for any cables.
nodes.title: JustStream 2.0 - Screen-mirroring and streaming software for Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.title: Over 100 million Americans have now received at least 1 dose of the covid-19 vaccine. We've averaged 3 million shots per day over the last week, a new high. ğŸ™ https://t.co/2wekz7YtRi

nodes.excerpt: Resoume is a platform where you can create a beautiful website, portfolio and resume for your next job interview. It is also the biggest project I worked on as a solo frontend developer with joy, love, sweat and tears ğŸ™ƒ â¤ ï¸ğŸ’¦ ğŸ¥º
nodes.title: Resoume v2 - Create a beautiful website and resume
nodes.author: Gobie Nanthakumar

nodes.excerpt: A large collection of ready to used library to design and prototype your ideas, faster. More than 250+ building blocks with 150+ screen template. Available for Figma, Sketch, XD
nodes.title: Bloo Lo-fi Wireframe Kit - Open source wireframe kit for design and prototyping
nodes.author: vijay verma

nodes.excerpt: A weekly updated collection of hand picked tweets specially tailored to save time and give great reading experience. Consider it as a new way to consume Twitter.
nodes.title: Growth Tweets - Weekly-updated repository of tweets that matter
nodes.author: Ankit Ghosh

nodes.excerpt: SocialQ+ is a virtual social media superhero that lets you collaborate, schedule & analyze your posts for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, telegram, reddit, tumblr, rss feed team member LinkedIn & Youtube from the same spot.
nodes.title: SocialQ+ - Marketing platform for social networks
nodes.author: SocialQ+

nodes.excerpt: What if you were paid to learn a skill? UniU is a newsletter that incentivises ambitious people to learn a new skill & apply what they're learning by offering crypto bounties for completing learning tasks. Information is nice, action changes everything.
nodes.title: UniU - A newsletter that pays you to learn future skills
nodes.author: Tim Hatherley-Greene

nodes.excerpt: Billable helps you keep track of time spent on your projects. Simply select a project and start tracking your time. Beautifully organized per day, project and client.
nodes.title: Billable - Simple, beautiful time tracker for Mac
nodes.author: Don Kooijman
